text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a uan asɨzibar okoruabar tongɨn sipsipɨn apurir bar aghuir duaba an mɨkarzimɨn puvatɨzitam inigh, ofan mɨn ofa gamir gumazim bagh mangɨ, egh uan arazir kurabar osɨmtɨziba akɨr da agɨfagh. Eghtɨ ofa gamir gumazim sipsipɨn gumazim inigha izezir kamɨn ivezim dɨborogh a datɨgh. Eghtɨ gumazim sipsipɨn kamagh garitam, ofa gamir gumazim bagh a inigh izɨtɨ, a gumazir kamɨn osɨmtɨzim agevir ofa damightɨ, God an arazir kuraba gɨn amadagham.
